segments.text: I can't help but feel a sense of calm when I look out the window and see the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a stark contrast to the turmoil simmering in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how peaceful life can seem outside, while inside it’s a different story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks unbothered, lost in her own world, while disaster looms.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching into that jar, and part of me admires his bravery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, it makes me anxious to watch him wobble on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout a warning, but I hold back, knowing it might ruin their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
